title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank. The President manages the work of the Bank under the guidance of the Board of Directors. ... The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, the European Union and the European Investment Bank.

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: Our background and history · Our organisation · Our values · Strategies, governance and compliance · Project accountability · Back · Story of the EBRD · Basic documents establishing the Bank · Back · Governance and leadership · Shareholders · Staff · Headquarters ·

title: EBRD: staff, structure, history
snippet: Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (left). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors.

title: EBRD Senior Leadership Group
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects. ... Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before. ... We draw on three decades of regional knowledge and financial expertise to tailor our products and approaches to each client's needs. ... Our senior leadership group covers every aspect of the EBRD's business and advises the Executive Committee and President.
